thread.title: BRIEF-GDS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.02

title: BRIEF-GDS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.02
text: March 13, 2018 / 10:51 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-GDS Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.02 Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Gds Holdings Ltd: * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE RMB 2.46 BILLION TO RMB 2.56 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE RMB 505.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW RMB 483.8 MILLION * FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE BETWEEN RMB905 MILLION AND RMB935 MILLION * EXPECTS TO INCUR CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF BETWEEN RMB2,600 MILLION TO RMB3,000 MILLION FOR 2018 * QTRLY ‍ DILUTED LOSS PER ADS WAS RMB1.09​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
